CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 24, 1945, pg. 13 reads: " Cave-In - in wake of the recent deluge of rain and snow storms, undermining of land, retaining walls, and ground under many streets, has been felt in the Hill District. A small truck backed onto the sidewalk at this clothing shop owned by Harry Kaplan at 1104 Wylie Avenue, and the entire sidewalk caved in.-Harris Photo
TitMainTitle: Man wearing hat standing in front of K-B Clothing Exchange on Wylie Avenue, with caved in sidewalk, another version
